item.title: A Person Re-Identification System For Mobile Devices
item.description: More detail can easily be written here using Markdown and $\rm \LaTeX$ math code.

item.title: Mobile visual clothing search
item.description: A mobile visual clothing search system is presented whereby a smart phone user can either choose a social networking image or capture a new photo of a person wearing clothing of interest and search for similar clothing in a large cloud-based ecommerce database. The phone’s GPS location is used to re-rank results by retail store location, to inform the user of local stores where similar clothing items can be tried on.
